mosinstall.name: Login Form
mosinstall.author: Simple Machines
mosinstall.description: This module displays a Username and Password login form. It also displays a link to retrieve a forgotten password. If user registration is enabled, (refer to the Configuration settings), then another link will be shown to invite users to self-register.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed above the login form

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed below the login form

param.name: smf_align
param.label: Align
param.description: Defines how the module will be displayed: left, center, right * Standard is right *

param.name: login
param.label: Login Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the login redirect to after login
param.option: Back to the SMF Main Page
Back to the page from which the user logged in

param.name: logout
param.label: Logout Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the logout redirect to
param.option: Back to the SMF Main Page
Back to the page from which the user logged out

param.name: login_message
param.label: Login Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Login Success

param.name: logout_message
param.label: Logout Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Logout Success

param.name: smf_personal_welcome
param.label: Personal welome
param.description: Show/Hide the personal welcome * Hello Username *

param.name: smf_notification
param.label: Notify
param.description: Show/Hide the displaying of the logged in message * Hello xxx, you have x messages, y are new *

param.name: smf_unread
param.label: Unread
param.description: Show/Hide the displaying of unread message since last visit

param.name: smf_new_answers
param.label: New Answers
param.description: Show/Hide the displaying of new answers to own posts

param.name: smf_new_pms
param.label: New PMs
param.description: Show/Hide the displaying of new PMs (private messages)

param.name: smf_loggedin_time
param.label: Logged in Time
param.description: Show/Hide the displaying of the time the user was already looged in

param.name: smf_logout_button
param.label: Use Logout Button
param.description: Use the logout button, or a text link

param.name: smf_logout_button_image
param.label: Set your own logout button image
param.description: Type in the URL of the image you wish to use for the logout button
